item.title: Olivia add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "You know how confusing the whole good-evil concept is for me." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Paranoid? Probably. But just because you're paranoid doesn't mean there isn't an invisible demon about to eat your face." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Olivia add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "So, there I was, tied to an altar made from outdated encyclopedias, about to get sacrificed to the dark powers by a cult of evil Librarians." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Birds are the last of the dinosaurs. Tiny velociraptors with wings. Devouring defenseless wiggly things and, and nuts, and fish, and, and other birds. They get the early worms. And have you ever watched a chicken eat? They may look innocent, but birds are, well, they're vicious. " -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Everybody going to be dead one day, just give them time." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Beware of Doors." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "What I say is, a town isn't a town without a bookstore. It may call itself a town, but unless it's got a bookstore it knows it's not fooling a soul." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Some hats can only be worn if you're willing to be jaunty, to set them at an angle and to walk beneath them with a spring in your stride as if you're only a step away from dancing. They demand a lot of you." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "His name is Marcus: he is four and a half and possesses that deep gravity and seriousness that only small children and mountain gorillas have ever been able to master." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Holly Black
item.description: "Can't get away from your own self." -- Holly Black

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "Wizards First Rule: People are Stupid" -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Garth Nix
item.description: "Does the walker choose the path, or the path the walker?" -- Garth Nix

item.title: Olivia add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "Life is pain, highness. Anyone who says differently is selling something." -- William Goldman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "The Queen's Pride was his ship, and he loved her. (That was the way his sentences always went: It is raining today and I love you. My cold is better and I love you. Say hello to Horse and I love you. Like that.)" -- William Goldman

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "Curiosity killed the cat,” Fesgao remarked, his dark eyes unreadable. Aly rolled her eyes. Why did everyone say that to her? “People always forget the rest of the saying,” she complained. “‘And satisfaction brought it back." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "Threats are the last resort of a man with no vocabulary." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "If you've a story, make sure it's a whole one, with details close to hand. It's the difference between a good lie and getting caught." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Richelle Mead
Olivia add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "I thought as much. Miss Murray, though I am a beast, do not think that I am stupid. I know that I am hideous and hateful. I am not loved, nor ever hope to be. Nor am I fool enough to think that what I feel for you is love. But in this world, alone, I do not hate you. And alone in this world, you do not hate me." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Ai Yazawa
item.description: "I'll make you so in love with me, that everytime our lips touch, you'll die a little death." -- Ai Yazawa

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Ai Yazawa
item.description: "In this world, not everything will be won by justice. If you want to win, you have to learn how to cheat. (Nana)" -- Ai Yazawa

item.title: Olivia add a quote by Phil Foglio
